017package org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping;
018
019import com.google.errorprone.annotations.Keep;
020
021import java.lang.annotation.Documented;
022import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
023import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
024import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
025import java.lang.annotation.Target;
026
027/**
028 * Indicates that the given type is capable of being serialized and deserialized
029 * by an object mapper.
030 *
031 * <p>Types with this annotation must be instantiable by the object mapper. By
032 * default, this includes objects with zero-argument constructors and records,
033 * but this may be extended using a customized
034 * {@link org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.ObjectMapper.Factory}.</p>
035 *
036 * @since 4.0.0
037 */
038@Keep
039@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
040@Target(ElementType.TYPE)
041@Documented
042public @interface ConfigSerializable {
043}
